name: StarPrey (nartier)
description:
In Starprey you play as the deadly Red Starfighter hunting and killing spacecraft around the universe.
Gameplay is extremely fast-paced and tactical; you accelerate and drift around, bouncing off barriers to avoid asteroids and enemy fire.

Features:

50 levels

2 boss fights

Physicsy movement

Instant restarts

Easy mode (for losers)
